,,, 5GHz Front End Module;Qorvo;RFFM4558;4558, B0ZX;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = Senao |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = OpenWrt |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 09/07/2017 |estreldate = |estprice = 300 |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Taiwan |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |acqam1 = |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1cpu = true |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "WR-1-0.20 LFP" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :OEM: [[Senao]] (PCB ID: 7016A1374004) The user manual on the FCC suggests that the default username/password is pakedge/pakedger but the label sample says admin/admin. ==Links of Interest== *[http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20170907005259/en/Control4-Announces-Pakedge-Wireless-Router-BakPak-Lite ''Control4 Announces Pakedge Wireless Router with BakPak Lite
at CEDIA 2017'' on '''BusinessWire'''] ===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Qualcomm]]'' IPQ4018 @717MHz Quad-Core ARM (Cortex-A7) *Storage: 32MB (SPI NOR) Flash *Memory: 256MB (DDR3L) SDRAM *WiFi: 802.11bgn (2.4GHz), 802.11an/ac (5GHz) *Network: 5x Gigabit Ethernet ports *USB: 1x USB 2.0 ports *Power: 12V/1.5A via barrel ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/pakedge/pakedge_wr-1 |wikipage = |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = ipq40xx |subtarget = generic |arch = arm_cortex-a7_neon-vfpv4 |support_started_version = 23.05.0 |current_supported_version = 23.05.3 |unsupportedfuncntions = |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==Pictures==
